title: January 4, 2015
paragraph: Today's beauty is a warm breeze, watching football by the water, and spending time with the person that makes my life completely wonderful

title: January 22, 2015
paragraph: Today's beauty was easy to find. I lived my time in the butterfly gallery at the Detroit zoo and seeing butterflies down here always reminds me of that time. It was a time that allowed me to see whimsy and mystery that I had lost as I grew up.

title: February 4, 2015
paragraph: Today's beauty was persistence. JavaScript does not come naturally for me but I know if I keep trying I will one day figure it out.
